meta.description: Determine the optimal allocation of production hours to maximize the number of completed products.

params.name: production_capacity
params.description: Total production hours available for each workshop

params.name: productivity
params.description: Productivity in units per hour for each component in each workshop

vars.name: hours_allocated
vars.description: Hours allocated to each component in each workshop

objective.name: max_completed_products
objective.expr: sum(productivity[w][c] * hours_allocated[w][c] for w in WORKSHOPS for c in COMPONENTS)
objective.description: Maximize the number of completed products

constraints.name: capacity_A
constraints.description: Total hours allocated in workshop A should not exceed its capacity

constraints.name: capacity_B
constraints.description: Total hours allocated in workshop B should not exceed its capacity

constraints.name: capacity_C
constraints.description: Total hours allocated in workshop C should not exceed its capacity

constraints.name: capacity_D
constraints.description: Total hours allocated in workshop D should not exceed its capacity
